item.description:
Milarepa: Magician, Murderer and Saint is a tale of greed, hate and the lust for vengeance but also of awakening to the Buddha's path. The film portrays the captivating early life of Milarepa, Tibet’s greatest mystic, and the tragic and mystical events lead him to embark on the spiritual journey. Directed by Lama Neten Choling.

After this film, as part of the discussion, the interview with the director will be shown.

Winner of the European Film Festival 2010’s Best Spiritual Fiction, Official Selection of the Berlin Film Festival 2008, and the Audience Award Winner of the National Geographic All Roads Film Festival 2006.

To learn more and see trailer, visit http://www.milarepamovie.com/wp/
item.why: It's a great way to learn more about Buddhism, Tibetan culture and one of its greatest teachers. Also, It is a good way to meet others will similar interests.
